title: We Not Survive
description: We not survive is an idle tower defense game that challenges players to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. As a survivor, you must defend your base from waves of terrifying monsters using a range of weapons and facilities that can be upgraded. The game's main currency is petroleum, which can be extracted and used to upgrade your base's weapons, projectiles, and health regeneration capabilities. As you progress through the game, you can unlock surprising unique powers and facilities that help you to defend yourself better against the increasingly challenging waves of enemies! So, are you ready to take on the zombie apocalypse and stay alive?
